createNucleictideNodeGraph

@Deprecated
public static y.view.Graph2D createNucleictideNodeGraph(java.lang.String notation)
                                                 throws org.helm.notation.MonomerException,
                                                        java.io.IOException,
                                                        org.jdom.JDOMException
Deprecated. 

Create a standard graph. Each graph contains 3 nodes, base<-R->P where R and P are standard monomers

Parameters:
notation - : the base monomer id. A, T, C, G, U
Returns:
a graph that represents a notation
Throws:
org.helm.notation.MonomerException
java.io.IOException
org.jdom.JDOMException
